organisation_name: Associazione Nazionale Industrie Farmaci Generici e Biosimilari (ASSOGENERICI)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership:
Assogenerici is a full member of the Medicines for Europe. 
 
The Medicines for Europe is the official representative body of the European generic and biosimilar pharmaceutical industry, which is at the forefront of providing high-quality affordable medicines to millions of Europeans and stimulating competitiveness and innovation in the pharmaceutical sector. 
 
Formed in 1993, the Medicines for Europe represents generic pharmaceuticals companies and their subsidiaries from throughout Europe, either directly or through national associations. Companies represented within the Medicines for Europe  provide over 150,000 jobs in Europe. Cost-effective generic medicines save EU patients and healthcare systems over €30 billion each year, thus helping to ensure patient access to essential medicines and providing urgently needed budget headroom for the purchase of new and innovative treatments. 
 
The Medicines for Europe  plays an important consultative role in European healthcare policy-making. The Medicines for Europe  and its members work with the European national governments and the EU institutions to develop affordable solutions for pharmaceutical care and to increase Europe’s competitive strength in the global pharmaceutical medicines market.
legal_status: ASSOCIAZIONE DI CATEGORIA SENZA SCOPO DI LUCRO
